content.title: BCT Terminal
content.quote: BCT Terminal ecosystem, microservices, several independent applications

content.title: OMN
content.quote: It's used to cover the whole process of printed media production preparation from catalog/page concept to getting hard copy from print machine. The system has plugin client-server architecture that allows extending both server and client functionality.

content.title: 12devs
content.caption: April 2021 - present
content.quote: Team of developers which has been creating effective IT solutions for small and medium-sized businesses around the world since 2012
content.description: Pretty small company, but all the projects use relatively modern technologies. Quite pleasant experience to work here.

content.title: IntexSoft
content.caption: October 2019 – April 2021
content.quote: IntexSoft delivers end-to-end software development services for businesses and IT companies. Organizing teamwork, we take care of the development process while our clients are making progress
content.description: It was my first experience in developing production software. Learned a lot of useful stuff here. But technologies was way too obsolete, and that was not the technological stack I was interested in when I applied to the position. Eventually, I had to move on to maintain professional growth.
